abstract: A spokesman said that Toyota was “very concerned” about the problem and that engineers were evaluating potential remedies.
snippet: A spokesman said that Toyota was “very concerned” about the problem and that engineers were evaluating potential remedies.
lead_paragraph: Toyota said Friday that its engineers had duplicated the errant slide that prompted Consumer Reports to issue a “don’t buy” warning on the 2010 Lexus GX 460 and acknowledged that the vehicle had a safety problem.

headline.main: Toyota Agrees Lexus S.U.V. Has Problem With Handling
headline.print_headline: Toyota Agrees Lexus S.U.V. Has Problem With Handling
